summary: This is an internal email from a correctional institution, likely the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, notifying staff that eight FBI officials will visit the Special Housing Unit (SHU) on August 17, 2019, to perform investigative matters. The email instructs lieutenants to be available to escort them.

events.title: FBI Visit to SHU
events.description: Eight FBI officials visited the Special Housing Unit (SHU) of a correctional institution to perform investigative matters.

locations: SHU (Special Housing Unit) - Likely within the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, where Jeffrey Epstein was held.
keyFacts: Eight FBI officials were scheduled to visit the Special Housing Unit (SHU) of a correctional institution on August 17, 2019.
The visit was for investigative purposes, occurring shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in the SHU on August 10, 2019.
The email instructs correctional lieutenants to be available to escort the FBI officials during their visit.
The document is internal institutional correspondence, highlighting official investigative activity following a major incident.
